alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Pottawatomie; Shawnee; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 11:26PM CDT until May 08 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Shawnee County in east central Kansas... Northeastern Wabaunsee County in east central Kansas... Southeastern Pottawatomie County in northeastern Kansas... Southwestern Jackson County in northeastern Kansas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1125 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Paxico, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 1110 PM, trained spotter reported quarter size hail in St. George. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Rossville, St. Marys, Maple Hill, McFarland, Paxico, Belvue, Delia and Willard. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 328 and 347. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
